body:
Another sign that Radiance continues to be popular is that the sales of Rendering with Radiance have gone up dramatically (4x) this past month.  Perhaps this is because the book is now available at Amazon.com with quick-ship.  It says there are 5 books in stock that can be delivered by Nov. 12th.  


Oh darn...that wasn't supposed to sound like an advertisement.  :-)


-Chas
